blogPost.excerpt: PERKS is for Remote Teams, Startups, Gig Workers, Students and many more! The future of work needs a new system to provide people the tools they need to live a happy and productive work life. We built PERKS to bring the best campus experience to everyone!
blogPost.body: PERKS is for Remote Teams, Startups, Gig Workers, Students and many more! The future of work needs a new system to provide people the tools they need to live a happy and productive work life. We built PERKS to bring the best campus experience to everyone!
blogPost.title: PERKS - The Google Campus Experience digitized
blogPost.author: Darren Murph

localize.description: PERKS适用于远程团队、创业公司、临时工、学生等。未来的工作需要一个新的系统来为人们提供所需的工具，让他们过上快乐和高效的工作生活。我们打造PERKS是为了给大家带来最好的校园体验!
PERKS適用於遠程團隊、創業公司、臨時工、學生等。未來的工作需要一個新的系統來爲人們提供所需的工具，讓他們過上快樂和高效的工作生活。我們打造PERKS是爲了給大家帶來最好的校園體驗!

previous.excerpt: Tired of spending too much time in back-to-back meetings and lengthy chat discussions? Try Threadit -- short video recordings to show your work, connect your team, and get your day back. Get started at threadit.app or learn more at threadit.area120.com
previous.title: Threadit by Google - Short video recordings for async collaboration

localize.description: 厌倦了在背靠背的会议和冗长的聊天讨论中花费太多时间？试试Threadit -- 短暂的视频记录来展示你的工作，连接你的团队，并让你的一天回归。开始在threadit.app或在threadit.area120.com了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用于异步协作的短视频录制

localize.description: 厭倦了在背靠背的會議和冗長的聊天討論中花費太多時間？試試Threadit -- 短暫的視頻記錄來展示你的工作，連接你的團隊，並讓你的一天迴歸。開始在threadit.app或在threadit.area120.com瞭解更多。
localize.tagline: 用於異步協作的短視頻錄製

next.title: The US housing boom continues with prices hitting all-time highs again, up 11.2% over the past year. This is the highest YoY increase since 2006. https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2

localize.full_text: 美国房市热潮仍在继续，房价再创历史新高，过去一年上涨11.2%。这是自2006年以来最高的同比增幅。https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2。
美國房市熱潮仍在繼續，房價再創歷史新高，過去一年上漲11.2%。這是自2006年以來最高的同比增幅。https://t.co/JVLdMSaCn2。
